alert.note: Alert for Clay; Duval; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 31 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Florida, including the following counties, Clay, Duval and St. Johns. * WHEN...Until 645 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Bellair- Meadowbrook Terrace, Nas Jax, Ortega, Lakeside, Fleming Island, Doctors Inlet, Switzerland, Riverside, San Marco, Normandy and Jacksonville Heights. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
